articles.title: Explained: In dark chocolate and green tea, compounds that block the coronavirus enzyme - The Indian Express
articles.description: The enzyme whose function is blocked is the ‘main protease’ (Mpro) in SARS-CoV-2. The virus requires this enzyme in order to replicate. If MPro is blocked or deactivated, the virus cannot survive.
articles.content: The chemical compounds in green tea and muscadine grapes were found to be very successful at inhibiting Mpros function, the researchers said.Certain foods and beverages such as green tea, dark chocol… [+1968 chars]

articles.author: Satata Karmakar
articles.title: Covid-19 vaccines to be available soon, but don’t forget handwashing - TheHealthSite
articles.description: As Covid-19 vaccine is all set to get the nod experts continue to stress the need for handwashing to safeguard against the futher transmission.
